marklogic.body:
I'm so Glad you wrote this! Since I started watching The Walking Dead, my main point in trying to persuade others to watch it is that it reminds me so much of LOST. I wasn't necessarily referring to the characters (even though I think your comparisons are Spot-on), but more in a community survival/trying to make a life for themselves way.
Also, just a point of interest - Robert Kirkman apologized for the lack of T-Bone/Dog in the second season, saying that he'll get more of a focus. Poor, poor T.
